name: Black Label Trading Co. - Salvation - Toro
additionalNotes: Founded in 2013 by James and Angela Brown with a philosophy focusing on less is more, this company recently began to create quite the buzz among the cigar industry. Black Label Trading Salvation is a mouthwatering Ecuadorian Sun Grown Habano wrapper encases a mix of premium Honduran binder and Nicarguan filler that make this medium-bodied gem ooze with a unique flavor profile filled with notes of charred wood, chocolate, smoky sweetness, and peppery spice. These cigars offers a balanced "Salvation" for the cigar lovers who have grown weary of the same hum-drum herfing experiences day in and day out.
